title: The Healing Medicine of Forgiveness
itunes:author: Guests: Al & Lisa Robertson
itunes:summary: Healthy marriages are built on a foundation of forgiveness. When you choose to forgive, your relationship can weather any storm. John, Greg and Erin give helpful reasons why you should choose forgiveness instead of resentment. Receive the book Desperate Forgiveness with your gift of any amount!
